concept.title: Encrypting databases on creation
concept.shortdesc: You configure a database for encryption when you create the database by specifying the dataEncryption=true attribute on the connection URL.

conbody.p: The Java Runtime Environment (JRE) determines the default encryption provider, as follows:

ul.li: For J2SE/J2EE 1.4 or higher, the JRE's provider is the default.
If your environment for some reason does not include a provider, it must be specified.

conbody.p: You have the option of specifying an alternate encryption provider. The default encryption algorithm is DES, but you have the option of specifying an alternate algorithm as well. See
